programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Exhausted by a European book tour, Jessica stops off to see an old friend who owns a luxurious Monte Carlo hotel, but it is not long before a murderer checks in. Ian Ogilvy guest stars, with Angela Lansbury

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Muslim US Marine is found seemingly shot dead near a mosque that has been linked to an al-Qaeda recruiter. Ducky refuses to perform an autopsy out of respect for the man's religion, but Abby runs tests that reveal his demise was actually due to poisoning from a rare octopus venom. Meanwhile, McGee goes into the mosque intending to plant a concealed microphone - but discovers someone has had the same idea

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team set up a stake-out at a storage facility to catch a thief suspected of selling hi-tech Navy equipment on the black market, but end up witnessing a murder. To make matters worse, $90million worth of radar gear goes missing while they are distracted. Meanwhile, Ducky asks Abby to run a series of mysterious blood tests, raising suspicions that he is harbouring a secret

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A suspect in a drug-smuggling case is seemingly mauled to death by his own dog, which is immediately scheduled to be destroyed - but Abby refuses to hand it over to Navy officials and launches her own investigation. Meanwhile, Gibbs continues to worry about Shepard's health, convinced she and Ducky are hiding something. Drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and Lauren Holly

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A traffic collision that resulted in multiple fatalities is seemingly caused by a drink driver, but that theory is dismissed as Lupo and Bernard's investigation gets under way. The detectives discover a nasal spray that has been spiked to disorient its user and learn a pharmaceutical company worker was intending to disclose sensitive details about her employer - so the duo try to track down her boss

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A key witness in a murder trial is found dead outside her hotel room, and Lupo and Bernard's investigation embroils them in a conspiracy involving black-market dealings, drug cartels and corrupt officials. With the lives of other witnesses in danger, Rubirosa finds herself caught in the crossfire

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate when a community activist is murdered. Meanwhile, Van Buren gets bad news from former detective Ray Curtis. Police drama, starring Jeremy Sisto, Anthony Anderson and S Epatha Merkerson

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A harmless tramp is attacked by an over-zealous vigilante and left for dead in a deserted alley, sending Briscoe and Logan in pursuit of his assailant. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A famous rock star is acquitted of raping a fan after the victim's claims are rejected. Logan and Briscoe decide to investigate further, and discover the musician's pleasant reputation does not quite match his personality. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A serial killer begins posting footage of his crimes online - and as the agents investigate, they realise that each film contains visual clues to the identity of the next victim. In a further bizarre twist, Abby later finds what seems to be a new video on her computer - and the case takes on fresh urgency with the discovery that it is actually a live feed, suggesting the murderer is somewhere on the premises

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bank at Quantico is robbed and a security guard killed, but the team soon discovers that stealing money may not have been the perpetrators' primary objective. Meanwhile, Gibbs is given the task of evaluating an inexperienced new agent assigned by Vance to help investigate the case. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Rey Valentin

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs sends DiNozzo and Ziva to retrieve top-secret information from a secure military base - a mission aimed at catching a mole in the NCIS ranks. Unfortunately, it soon becomes clear that the traitor is still at large - so the building is locked down and all agents are rounded up in a final effort to catch the culprit. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team struggles to locate a suspect following the murder of an eight-year-old boy whose body is found on a hiking trail in Pennsylvania. As the case develops and the number of victims increases, two more children go missing in the same area, and the agents work quickly to stop the pair becoming the killer's next targets

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU is sent to Las Cruces, New Mexico, to investigate a series of murders within a gated community. Three women have been strangled in the past two months, and when the team discovers that no non-residents were present at the time of the last killing, they employ FBI agent Ashley Seaver to root out the criminal

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney is found strangled in his car in an area notorious for prostitution. Benson is shocked to realise she briefly dated the victim and refuses to believe he would have paid for sex. As investigations get under way, DNA evidence reveals the dead man might have been gay. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The rape and murder of a criminology student puts detectives Stabler and Benson on the trail of a killer with an expert knowledge of forensics. A discovery about the victim's mentor places him at the top of their list of suspects - but as further evidence is gathered, it begins to seem that someone might have tried to frame him for the crime

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren infiltrates the psychiatric ward of a New York jail, without the knowledge of his superiors, to investigate disturbing allegations by his inmate nephew that prisoners are being systematically abused, tortured and even killed by sadistic guards. Drama, starring Vincent d'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: While investigating the execution-style killing of three college students on a basketball court, Logan struggles to understand what appears to be a motiveless triple murder. At a loss to identify a reason for the shooting, he must rely on the testimony of a survivor of the attack if he is to bring the killers to justice

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A fugitive sex offender kidnaps his accuser, leading Detectives Benson and Stabler to question the man's dying mother to discover where he is heading. She believes her son is innocent and is merely trying to prove he is not guilty by forcing his 'victim' to go back on his lies. Starring Mariska Hargitay, Christopher Meloni and Dann Florek

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS

However, an eyewitness later comes forward and implicates Tony. Starring Lauren Holly and Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation into a freelance journalist's murder leads detectives Lupo and Bernard to uncover a connection between the victim and a talk-show host. Crime drama, starring Jeremy Sisto

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Two teens from an underachieving high school are accused of burning to death a student from a more successful charter school. Lupo and Bernard investigate, and soon begin to suspect the boys' principal is providing them with a bogus alibi. Jeremy Sisto and Anthony Anderson star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate when a woman is found brutally murdered, and the evidence leads them to a medical school student. Police drama, starring Jeremy Sisto and Anthony Anderson

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Briscoe and Logan face a race against time to catch a serial killer carrying out a series of racially motivated murders. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Christopher Noth

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A wealthy man is found dead in his bed, and the team receive an anonymous tip that he was murdered. Logan and Briscoe encounter difficulties at the scene when the widow and her attorney refuse to allow an autopsy. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.desc: The body of a superintendent is found in the basement of his building, leading Logan and Briscoe to suspect his death was the result of a break-in gone wrong. However, forensic evidence points the finger of suspicion at the victim's 17-year-old son, who Dr Olivet believes is an abusive sociopath. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Having identified the mole in their ranks, the agents arrest the traitor's contact Ted Bankston, a former NSA agent working for a kidnapper code-named the Weatherman - who is making millions on the stock markets out of stolen military data. Drama, with Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is killed in what initially seems to be a road-rage incident - until investigations reveal evidence of foul play. Digging deeper, the team finds the dead man belonged to an underground fight club, and sets about discovering whether his involvement was a factor in the case. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, the team works overtime to solve a robbery - a case made doubly difficult by the fact that the prime suspect is a former petty officer who has supposedly been dead for 17 years. Eventually arrested at a Vietnam memorial, he manages to convince Gibbs of his innocence - but a discovery in the forensics lab suggests he may be guilty after all. Guest starring Peter Coyote

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Erin enlists Danny and Jackie's help to find the killer of an informant who had been helping her build a case against corrupt construction bosses. Meanwhile, Frank deals with a media backlash when footage emerges online of an NYPD officer appearing to assault an elderly citizen

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Munch becomes personally involved in the prosecution of a terminally ill embryologist who is accused of assisting a depressed woman in committing suicide. Evidence points overwhelmingly to her guilt - but the jury finds it hard to decide her fate. Hard-hitting police drama, guest starring Marlee Matlin

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the murder of an elderly woman who they learn was dying of cancer but had been determined to live out her final days to the full - a philosophy that encompassed dating a variety of men. Discovering her most recent gentleman callers all have alibis, they turn their attention to the murder weapon and realise they are looking for a serial killer. Anthony Rapp and Jane Krakowski guest star

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Under suspension pending a psychiatric evaluation, Goren places his life and career in jeopardy by working undercover to take down a high-profile drug-dealer - and expose two corrupt police officers in the process. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An arrogant gossip columnist is murdered, and Logan enlists the help of Megan Wheeler, back in the US after working undercover in Europe, to help him investigate a related celebrity sex scandal. However, as the duo scrutinise the dead man's life, the list of possible suspects grows increasingly longer

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An Alzheimer's patient claims to have been raped. Fin receives his sergeant orders. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Ice-T

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is accused of murdering two Arab-Americans - but his attorney mounts a novel defence, claiming he was compelled to kill because he is genetically predisposed toward hatred and violence. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Assistant coroner Palmer is called to the building site on a Navy base where a body has been found. While looking into the incident, he spots an armed man fleeing the scene with the victim's passport and is almost killed as he gives chase. It appears the document was stolen to hinder the investigation, but the discovery of a second corpse reveals a case of stolen identity and a compensation racket

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part story, the entire team is put in danger while hunting for the killer of a former NCIS agent. programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the murders of four policemen and discover a connection between drug dealers, a jealous husband and a remorseful judge

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the death of an environmental scientist who was poisoned at a global-warming convention. The case bringing up a number of suspects, including professional rivals and his wife's former husband, and for Cutter it stirs up unpleasant memories from his own past

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A bomb is planted in a Wall Street car park, and a woman is apprehended in connection with the crime. However, Stone and Kincaid work to prove the culprit had been brainwashed by Daniel Hendricks, the charismatic leader of a sinister religious cult. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A decomposed skeleton is unearthed on a construction site and identification proves troublesome for Stone. The deceased is eventually revealed to be a man who disappeared years earlier and was presumed murdered. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A worker at a meat-packing plant is killed in the workplace, prompting Logan and Briscoe to turn their attention to the man's disgruntled Russian bride. The pair learn the foreign widow married in the hope of a better life, but fell in love with a co-worker - and out of favour with her husband

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee is sent to a women's prison to interview a murder suspect, but ends up being captured by the inmates, who have run riot and seized control of a cell block, afraid they will be blamed for killing a guard. Held hostage as a bargaining chip, he tries to identify the real culprit before the warden takes drastic action to resolve the crisis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ducky is attacked by a knife-wielding woman who accuses him of war crimes, alleging he tortured and killed her brother in Afghanistan in the early 1980s. Gibbs investigates and ascertains what really happened - but has to work with the Afghan embassy to avoid an international incident. Drama, starring David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents investigate the private life of a murdered Navy captain whose actions may have led to his death, while McGee finds his ideal woman on the internet - but it turns out she is too good to be true. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray, Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Inquiries into the death of a marine land the team members squarely in the middle of an inner-city gang war - and a message found at the scene of the crime seemingly implicates Gibbs. Forced to confront a secret from his past, he calls his mentor Mike Franks for help. Drama, guest starring Muse Watson and Kari Coleman, with Mark Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Novak enlists Clark's help to gather evidence against a judge whose unacceptable bias in two child-abuse cases resulted in the death of a youngster and the wrongful imprisonment of an innocent woman. Police drama, starring Diane Neal, Marlo Thomas, Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A school headmistress is caught on camera sexually assaulting a teenage boy, but her behaviour later proves to have been caused by an operable brain tumour, prompting Novak and the team to allow a plea bargain. Unfortunately, the case turns out to have unforeseen complications. Starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Diane Neal

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A famous crime writer who used to date Captain Ross asks him to look into the disappearance of her much younger husband. Goren and Eames trace the man's movements via his car's GPS tracking system and suspect he was the victim of a carjacking. Further inquires lead them to believe he had staged the crime to run off with his lover, who is subsequently reported missing by her parents. Guest starring Brenda Strong (Desperate Housewives) and Eric Roberts (Heroes)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An activist fighting for the rights of the Tamil people survives an assassination attempt at JFK airport, but it soon becomes clear that members of her close circle have also been targeted. Logan and Wheeler are soon on the case - and the investigation puts them on the trail of an unlikely Canadian gun-for-hire as they race to catch the would-be killer. Starring Chris Noth and Julianne Nicholson

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The discovery of an African boy's dismembered body leads the detectives to suspect he was killed by cultists as a ritual sacrifice - but subsequent investigations implicate a slave-trading ring operating from Nigeria. programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. programme.title: Little Matters: Turtles
programme.desc: Turtles are slow, calm, gentle creatures - but not always

programme.title: Coastal Railways with Julie Walters
programme.desc: The actress travels from Cardigan Bay to Liverpool, visiting the heritage railway in Tywyn that was the inspiration for Thomas the Tank Engine and a community that is famous for knitting. She also paints a carriage in Boston Lodge, catches the famous Ffestiniog railway through Snowdonia, and visits Europe's fastest zip wire and largest pet cemetery

programme.title: The Devil's Disciple (1959)
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family is befriended by a minister. A case of mistaken identity leads both men to discover their true vocations during the American War of Independence. Historical drama based on George Bernard Shaw's play, starring Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas and Laurence Olivier

programme.title: The Best Man (1964)
programme.desc: Presidential candidates resort to smear tactics to have their party nominated at election time. Gore Vidal's political drama, starring Henry Fonda, Cliff Robertson, Margaret Leighton and Shelly Berman

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: A stray cat has been re-named Apple, but still needs a permanent home. Binky is one of the most seriously ill cats that Clare has met and 10-year-old Sparky has terminal cancer, prompting the vets to consider a homeopath potion

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.desc: A Russian ballerina defects to the West, and is drawn into a web of intrigue when she joins a London company run by a powerful, possessive woman. Drama, starring Joan Collins, Paul Nicholas and Finola Hughes

programme.title: Mysterious Creatures (2006)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Timothy Spall and Brenda Blethyn as the parents of a woman with mental health difficulties. When their daughter's hostile behaviour and the authorities' lack of support become too much to handle, the couple decide to commit suicide together, writing a letter to a local newspaper to explain the reasons behind their actions. The cast also includes Rebekah Staton and Judy Flynn

Romantic drama, with Tobias Menzies and Genevieve O'Reilly

programme.title: Prisoners of the Lost Universe (1983)

Stephen Rea, Pauline Collins, Caroline Quentin, Tom Weston-Jones, Tuppence Middleton, Anton Lesser and Omid Djalili star in this period drama, which re-imagines the works of Charles Dickens as inter-connected tales, set in a fictional version of 19th century London

Katie faces her hearing, refusing to deny her relationship with John any longer, and though Alex turns up at Jessica's flat, a declaration of love does not lead to a birthday reconciliation

programme.title: Elvis and Anabelle (2007)
programme.desc: A contestant drops dead in the middle of a beauty pageant, but miraculously returns to life on the mortician's slab. She forms an immediate bond with the jaded young man who was about to embalm her, and together they set off to pursue a new life away from their domineering parents. Romantic fantasy, starring Max Minghella and Blake Lively

programme.title: The Comic Strip Presents
programme.desc: A rookie cop interviews imprisoned cannibal Dr Genghis. At the same time, a man obsessed with serial killers records a video diary. Starring Adrian Edmondson

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Featuring Lee, Bermondsey and Stratford. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Dickensian
programme.desc: Bob Cratchit fights to clear his name to enable him to return home in time for his daughter's wedding, however the evidence is stacked up against him. Meanwhile, Compeyson's behaviour leaves Amelia feeling confused but intrigued. Stephen Rea, Pauline Collins, Caroline Quentin, Tom Weston-Jones, Tuppence Middleton, Anton Lesser and Omid Djalili star in this period drama, which re-imagines the works of Charles Dickens as inter-connected tales, set in a fictional version of 19th century London

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: 'Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital

programme.desc: South Africa v West Indies. Live coverage of the second day of Second and Final Test in the series from DP World Wanderers Stadium in Johannesburg. The sides have not met at this venue in this format since 2003, when the hosts won by 189 runs. In more recent times, the Proteas have also prevailed over the Windies here in a 2015 one-dayer, with the visitors winning at this ground in a T20 on the same tour
